content:
Yes, Inna has collaborated with various international artists throughout her career. Here are some of her collaborations with artists from other countries:

1. "More Than Friends" - a collaboration with the Spanish artist Juan Magan.
2. "Cola Song" - a collaboration with the Colombian artist J Balvin.
3. "Dancing with the Devil" - a collaboration with the American artist Yandel.
4. "Gucci Banana" - a collaboration with the Ugandan artist Vinka.

In addition to these, Inna has also worked with artists from other countries such as France, Mexico, and Italy. Her collaborations usually involve a fusion of different styles, such as Latin and electronic dance music. These collaborations have shown Inna's versatility as an artist and her ability to incorporate different cultural influences into her music.
